alert.note: Alert for Macomb; Oakland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 9:46AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Oakland and Macomb Counties through 1045 AM EDT... At 945 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Milford, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... West Bloomfield around 950 AM EDT. Southfield, Pontiac and Birmingham around 1000 AM EDT. Troy and Royal Oak around 1005 AM EDT. Warren and Rochester around 1010 AM EDT. Sterling Heights and Clinton around 1015 AM EDT. St. Clair Shores, Mount Clemens and Macomb Township around 1020 AM EDT. New Baltimore around 1030 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Franklin, Keego Harbor, Waterford, Shelby Township, Holly State Recreation Area, Commerce, Ray Center, Utica, Auburn Hills and Lake Angelus. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
